txt.en:
The note reads:

'Mazog, something's off with that Uruk Kranklûk. The boys see it, too. I think we'd best start paying close attention to those troops disappearing in the deep dark of that shadowy place. There might be something more than mushrooms there.'

Perhaps there is someone in the Twenty-first Hall who can help you with this.
'Orcs afraid of something other than us dwarves? Ha! It seems that this has something to do with the rumours I have heard from our Elves and the company I sent to the Shadowed Refuge.'
Upon defeating Talug, you discovered a note scrawled hastily and in nearly illegible handwriting. After some time you were able to make out what it said.
Bring the message to Veúlfur in the Twenty-first Hall

There might be a dwarf who can help with the note in the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nThe note seems to indicate that General Talug has some measure of both fear and apprehension of what lay in the deep dark places of Moria.
